title: 26. Sarah Stern - The Mystery on the Bridge
description:
This week on Murder With My Husband, Payton tells Garrett the story of Sarah Stern. Sarah mysteriously disappeared in the middle of the night; her car abandoned on the side of a bridge.
Case Sources:
ABC 20/20
https://abcnews.go.com/US/liam-mcatasney-sentenced-life-parole-murdering-friend-sarah/story?id=63869375
https://www.distractify.com/p/what-happened-to-sarah-stern
https://theblast.com/123658/the-murder-of-sarah-stern
https://heavy.com/entertainment/2020/03/sarah-stern-death-murderers/
https://www.chillingcrimes.com/blogs/news/sarah-stern
